channel.title: Macedonia on OFF THE HAMSTER WHEEL
channel.description: Recent content in Macedonia on OFF THE HAMSTER WHEEL

item.title: Biking in North Macedonia
item.description: The speed limits in North Macedonia are 50 km/h (31 mph) in built up areas, 80 km/h (50 mph) outside built up areas, and 120 km/h (78 mph) on motorways. In North Macedonia the motorways are numbered and prefixed with the letter A, the non motorway main roads are numbered and prefixed with the letter R, the smaller roads just have the names of the town that they lead to on the signs.

item.title: Days 82 to 84 August 2022
item.description:
Day 82

Miskloc is a place that I had again passed by whilst transiting through Hungary but I had never actually stopped in.
